lead_paragraph: The French government — amid wide criticism for deportation of hundreds of Roma — defended its actions on Tuesday and accused Romania of not doing enough to integrate members of its Roma minority.
snippet: The French government — amid wide criticism for deportation of hundreds of Roma — defended its actions on Tuesday and accused Romania of not doing enough to integrate members of its Roma minority.

headline.main: France Mounts Defense of Its Deportation of Roma
headline.print_headline: WORLD BRIEFING | EUROPE; France: Government Defends Deportation of Roma
